backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with ticket/help-topic types, storage/authorization mixins, counters, formatting helpers, and maps for storing tickets and topics.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing required frontend Help Center layout and tooltip changes and their related files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level summaries of all frontend files, noting recent UI, layout, and feature updates.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React app via bootstrap.ts with no-cache headers.
frontend/public/version.json: Contains version and build timestamp used by the bootstrap version-check system.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with tab navigation, admin-gated tabs, theme support, and page routing.
frontend/src/bootstrap.ts: Handles version checking, cache busting, and dynamic loading of the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the header with theme toggle, admin login dialog, and admin navigation dropdown.
frontend/src/components/TicketCounters.t: Renders clickable cards showing ticket counts by platform and status, computing filtered totals from the provided tickets.
frontend/src/components/TicketDetails.ts: Displays full ticket details with live refresh, comment submission, status/priority updates, and stored file metadata handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, loading identities, and handling login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching, searching, creating, and updating tickets using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollCues.ts: Tracks scroll position to expose whether an element can scroll up or down and if the user has scrolled.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and color variables, including platform, status, and priority themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Analysis.tsx: Provides an analytics dashboard allowing admins to filter, aggregate, and visualize ticket data via charts.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays ticket lists with searching, filtering, counters, and detail views for admins.
frontend/src/pages/EditHelpCenter.tsx: Allows admins to create, edit, delete, and publish help topics with rich‑text editing and hyperlink insertion.
frontend/src/pages/HelpCenter.tsx: Shows public help topics with platform filtering, search, and topic detail viewing.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitTicket.tsx: Implements a multi‑step ticket submission form with file uploads, validation, and backend submission.
frontend/src/utils/ticketSafeAccess.ts: Provides safe normalization and date formatting for ticket objects, applying defaults to avoid crashes from missing fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL/session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animation, and component styles with custom theme tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Help Center tile UI adjustments and tooltip requirements, with no backend or logic changes.
